panels.description: This dashboard will not work unless you install "PCM sensor server" separately.

options.content: This dashboard is **experimental preview feature** because it is based on "work in progress" PCM helm chart that needs to installed separately. Please follow instructions from project repository `/deployment/telemetry/helm/README.md#b-pcm-sensor-server---xeon-telemetry` README.md file to install `pcm-sensor-server`. Please note, that this dashboard is not dynamic. It needs to be recreated (as described in documentation above) for platform with different capabilities (Memory Bandwidth PMU access) and topology (e.g. number of sockets).

panels.title: Notice

targets.expr: rate(DRAM_Reads{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(DRAM_Writes{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Reads{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Writes{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576

rate(DRAM_Reads{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(DRAM_Writes{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Reads{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Writes{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576

rate(DRAM_Reads{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(DRAM_Writes{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Reads{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Writes{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576

rate(DRAM_Reads{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(DRAM_Writes{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Reads{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Writes{instance="$node", socket="0"}[60s])/1048576

rate(DRAM_Reads{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(DRAM_Writes{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Reads{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Writes{instance="$node", socket="1"}[60s])/1048576

rate(DRAM_Reads{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(DRAM_Writes{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Reads{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576 + rate(Persistent_Memory_Writes{instance="$node", aggregate="system"}[60s])/1048576
